tool.name: OGS: createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster'.
tool.command: createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster $output_refined_raster --refine '$refine' #for $f in $raster_file: --raster-file '$f' #end for #if str($property_name): --property-name '$property_name' #end if #for $f in $mesh: --mesh '$f' #end for --out-mesh output_1.vtu

param.name: output_refined_raster
param.label: output refined raster
param.help: Write refined raster to an additional, new ASC file.

param.name: refine
param.label: refine
param.help: refinement factor that raises the resolution of the raster data

param.name: raster_file
param.label: raster file
param.help: Input (.asc). The name of the input

param.name: property_name
param.label: property name
param.help: the name of the property the values are stored for

param.name: mesh
param.label: mesh
param.help: Input (.vtu). The input mesh is read from this file

tool.help: This tool runs the **createMeshElemPropertiesFromASCRaster** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
